text: The Cheesecake Factory is a North American-based restaurant company and cheesecake distributor. The company has 219 full service restaurants: 206 as The Cheesecake Factory and the last seven as Grand Lux Cafe. The first Cheesecake Factory restaurant opened in Beverly Hills, California in 1978. Its cheesecakes are found inside Barnes & Noble bookstores. ==Restaurant menu== On this restaurant's menu are chicken, cakes, burgers, fries, seafood, shrimp and pizza. Other foods are also available at The Cheesecake Factory. ==References== Category:1978 establishments in the United States Category:American restaurants
title: The Cheesecake Factory
